PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our CRM platform.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.item1: Personal information you provide, such as name, email address, and contact details.
section1.item2: Usage data, including how you interact with our service.
section1.item3: Cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.item1: To provide, operate, and maintain our CRM services.
section2.item2: To improve and personalize your experience.
section2.item3: To communicate with you, including support and updates.

section3.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
section3.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our service, subject to confidentiality agreements, or as required by law.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.item1: You may access, update, or delete your personal information at any time.
section5.item2: You can opt out of marketing communications.
section5.item3: Contact us to exercise your rights or for any privacy-related questions.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
section6.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

PrivacyPolicy.footer: Your CRM Company. All rights reserved.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: Welcome to our CRM platform. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). Please read them carefully.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By using our CRM, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the service.

section2.title: 2. Use of Service
section2.item1: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service.
section2.item2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
section2.item3: You agree not to misuse the service or help anyone else do so.

section3.title: 3. User Content
section3.content: You retain ownership of your data. By using our service, you grant us a license to store, process, and display your data as necessary to provide the service.

section4.title: 4. Privacy
section4.content: We respect your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

section5.title: 5. Termination
section5.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the service at our discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Terms
section6.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the service after changes means you accept the new Terms.

section7.title: 7. Disclaimer & Limitation of Liability
section7.content: The service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages resulting from your use of the service.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at

TermsOfService.footer: Your CRM Company. All rights reserved.
